name: RoyNat Capital
overview: RoyNat Capital, Inc. is a private equity arm of The Bank of Nova Scotia specializing in business expansion including purchase of real estate and lease of equipment, plant modernization; acquisitions including management buyout, leveraged buyout, and merger; working capital enhancement; and wealth monetization. The firm makes term loans and debt, subordinated debt, and mezzanine capital and equity investments in small and mid sized companies. It typically invests in aerospace, food, packaging business services, hospitality, transportation, distribution, and manufacturing sectors. The firm makes investments in Canada and United States. It invests between $0.25 million and $50 million in term loans; between $0.5 million and $10 million in subordinated debt; and minimum of $1 million in mezzanine and equity investments. The firm invests between $0.25 million and $50 million in companies with revenues between $2 million and $50 million. RoyNat Capital, Inc. was founded in 1962 and is based in Toronto, Canada and has additional offices across Canada and United States.
